Outstanding phone in this price segment. Design is good with a vegan leather finish instead of glass back. Buttery smooth and lag free. Available RAM is around 3.2GB out of 7.34GB which is good for a regular user like me. Connectivity is awesome with 13 5G Bands. But the only thing that disappoints is that display which is 720p not 1080p. Camera is good for outdoor lighting conditions
